branchCategory.name: PFMB7, Digital Flow Switch w/2 Color Display (5 to 500, 10 to 1000 & 20 to 2000 L/min)
branchCategory.description: <P>SMC's new PFMB dual color digital flow switch allows for a wide range of flow measurement with one product.  The PFMB is suitable for use with air and nitrogen.  It's compact and space saving with an integrated flow adjustment valve.  The bypass structure limits the contact of moist air with the sensor, reducing degradation of the sensor and helps maintain accuracy.  </P>
branchCategory.bullets: <UL> <LI>2-color display improves visibility <LI>Helps promote energy savings <LI>Response time can be set based on application <LI>Integrated flow adjustment valve <LI>Compact and space saving <LI>Expanded flow range </LI></UL>

breadCrumb.name: PFMB7, Digital Flow Switch w/2 Color Display
